TopicTitle: Helios II - A Sax Man Aeruonautics Delta II Replica

Articles.Content:
Standing at the launch pad is the Helios II with a Satellite. The Helios II lifted off successfully, bringing the satellite to a Geostationary Orbit. This rocket, a replica of the Delta II, made with the NovaPunch and Procedural Fairings mods, as well as stock, is a simple three staged rocket with Eight solid rocket boosters, providing about 2/3rds of the thrust, and the main cluster of 4 engines providing only 1/3rd of the thrust. With its efficiency -if flown right- and usability, it can bring Geostationary satellites into Orbit around Kerbin or even bring Interplanetary probes to their target outside Kerbin's SOI. Pictures of it in action will be provided soon. For now, here is the download link.

http://www.speedyshare.com/6bR9n/Helios-II-with-Satellite.craft

Action keys:

1 - Activate satellite instruments.

Edited September 24, 2013 by Sax Man Aeronautics
